name: Ember Cub
description: A young fire beast with explosive potential.

name: Riptide Pixie
description: A nimble water spirit that excels at defensive counters.

name: Mossback Scarab
description: A sturdy earth warrior with a reinforced shell.

name: Lumen Sprite
description: A delicate light creature with modest combat stats.

name: Inferno Lion
description: A fierce fire predator with a roaring burst of flames.

name: Cinder Vixen
description: A cunning fire creature. Support Effect: When activated, draw 1 card.

name: Granite Colossus
description: A massive stone guardian with no special abilities.

name: Umbral Wisp
description: A mysterious shadow creature. Support Effect: Choose a Fire creature. That creature gains +20 ATK while this support remains.

name: Abyssal Bulwark
description: A towering shield of water that absorbs incoming blows.

name: Seismic Hart
description: A mighty earth champion capable of shattering defenses.

name: Tempest Raptor
description: A swift wind predator. Support Effect: All Fire creatures gain +10 ATK while this remains in support.

name: Leviathan Coil
description: An ancient water serpent. Support Effect: When activated, remove one opponent support card.

name: Ignite Burst
description: Support: Choose an allied Fire creature. That creature gains +20 ATK while this support remains on the field.

name: Purge Beacon
description: Support: When activated, remove one card from an opponent's support slot. Can be played face-down but can only be activated if an opponent has at least one support.

name: Flame Aura
description: All Fire creatures you control gain +10 ATK while this card remains in play.

name: Card Draw Spell
description: Draw 1 card.

name: Blazing Strike
description: Deal 30 damage directly to your opponent. If you control a Fire creature, deal 50 damage instead.

name: Mirror Force
description: Trap: When an opponent's creature attacks, destroy up to 2 of their attack position creatures.

name: Quick Assessment
description: Draw 1 card. If you control no creatures, draw 2 instead.

name: Minor Reinforcement
description: Target creature gains +20 HP.

name: Call Home
description: Return one of your creatures to your hand.

name: Flame Spark
description: Deal 20 damage to a creature. If you control a Fire creature, deal 30 instead.

name: Combat Readiness
description: Target creature gains +30 ATK.

name: Guard Protocol
description: Target creature gains +30 DEF.

name: Power Surge
description: Gain 3 momentum.

name: Blazing Path
description: Destroy an enemy creature with 50 HP or less.

name: Tidal Collapse
description: Deal 40 damage to all enemy creatures.

name: Heal Pulse
description: Heal all your creatures for 30 HP.

name: Radiant Break
description: Remove all ATK and DEF bonuses from enemy creatures.

name: Shadow Bargain
description: Lose 30 HP from one of your creatures. Draw 2 cards.

name: Fusion Drive
description: Gain 5 momentum. Your opponent gains 2 momentum.

name: Inferno Detonation
description: Deal 80 damage to all creatures.

name: Absolute Severance
description: Destroy target creature. Your opponent loses 3 momentum.

name: Momentum Overload
description: Gain 3 momentum. End your turn.

name: Cull the Weak
description: Destroy all enemy creatures with 50 HP or less.

name: Final Accord
description: End all ongoing effects currently in play.

name: Cataclysmic Wave
description: Deal 100 damage to enemy creatures.

name: Ethereal Rebirth
description: Return all your creatures from the discard pile to your hand.

name: Temporal Stasis
description: Skip your opponent's next turn. You lose all momentum.

name: Ultimate Sacrifice
description: Destroy all of your creatures. Gain 10 momentum.
